message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's something that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. I'm proposing a price of $1200000. This reflects the product's unique capabilities and the significant value it can deliver to you. Let's discuss further and see if we can finalize this deal.

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I believe it's a fair price considering the value it can bring to my business.

Bob, I appreciate your offer and understand your perspective on the value. While $1000000 is a good starting point, I'm still a bit above that number.  I'm willing to come down to $1100000, recognizing the significant potential this product brings to your business. I believe this price is fair and reflects the unique capabilities we've discussed. Let's see if we can bridge the gap and finalize this deal.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm getting closer to the price I'm comfortable with. I'd like to propose a counteroffer of $1050000. I believe this price reflects the value the product will bring to my business and is a fair compromise.
